data.text: @HaarryWaalsh @DVLAgovuk Funny how the dvla can contact us whenever they want to throw extra charges at us but we can never get in touch with them agree they are utterly useless. Money grabbers don't care for soceity

@HaarryWaalsh @DVLAgovuk My hgv renewal for my job as a serving firefighter was sent recorded delivery and signed for onv1/12/21 I've not had it back and cannot get a reply by any means from them, disgraceful!
@HaarryWaalsh @DVLAgovuk Feel your pain, been waiting for my renewal since last June
@HaarryWaalsh @DVLAgovuk They’ve had my literal birth certificate for months 🙄🥱

@HaarryWaalsh @DVLAgovuk I lost my job 2 years ago due to the incompetence of @DVLAgovuk  not listening to my consultant. Now it seems they can't even issue a V5 without having to wait for 7 weeks and counting!! They ask for your phone  No and email, then send you a letter in the post😡
@HaarryWaalsh @DVLAgovuk I’ve actually just given up, I see why so many people are driving with no license rn
Watch @DVLAgovuk claim this is abuse when it’s just straight facts, your bio is there to cover up your shit efforts and hide https://t.co/TCIXzBMk3v
